p: Future changes in hydrological extremes are assessed by analysing changes in return levels of extreme discharges with return periods of 2, 5, 10, 20 and 50 years. Return levels are obtained by fitting a Gumbel extreme value distribution [ 97] through the simulated annual flow maxima during three 30-year periods (1971–2000, 2021–2050 and 2071–2100).
